annonstext:
Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.

In 2018, iZettle became part of the PayPal family. iZettle is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants. Tens of millions of small businesses worldwide are still being underserved by the traditional players. By giving small businesses the tools to get paid, sell smarter and grow, we’re empowering them to reach their full potential. Together with PayPal, we can reach 24 million merchants across the world with more of the affordable tools they need to thrive. Join us in putting an end to the ordinary way the world defines financial freedom.

Go where the people speak your language

As a QA Engineer, you will collaborate closely with developers, designers, and product managers to increase the testability of our products. You will be the driving force in empowering the team to deliver high-quality standards every step of the way, from requirements to production. From requirements based testing to exploratory testing to automated testing of Web as well as iOS and Android platforms - you’ll have the opportunity to do it all. You will be the team’s go-to person for all things related to quality and test automation tools. 

Your responsibilities will include

	Requirement analysis for testability of products
	Effective communication to provide a better-shared understanding across the entire team
	Release testing on different devices
	Exploratory testing of our apps
	Creation and maintenance of automated test cases and test automation set up
	Investigation of bugs and support tickets

The skills you need to succeed

You have solid experience and a genuine passion for testing and requirement analysis and are constantly exploring new solutions to problems. You have strong analytical skills and technical understanding, using this to communicate well with everyone in your team. Additionally, you’ll have:

	Solid understanding of product development, underlying system architecture and user requirements
	Experience of a diverse range device testing
	Good understanding of software backend and frontend development
	Experience in planning, designing and executing tests and user scenarios through manual and automated means on web and mobile apps (iOS and Android) 
	Knowledge of source control system i.e. github & CI/CD

Additionally, if you have experience in testing backend (API), regulatory requirements and have knowledge of CI/CD, we’d love to know. If not, we’ll be happy to help you get there.

Small minds never helped small businesses.

It takes originality and an open mind to start a small business. That’s why small minds have no place in ours. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer and together we uphold PayPal’s One Team Behavior, striving to be a place where everyone can benefit from equal access to professional development and bring their whole self to work.

We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom.
